markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deathcap Powder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=111)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 551 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 450 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The toxic deathcap mushroom can be dried, ground, and treated to form a flavorless powder with accelerated effects.

**Saving Throw** DC 33 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** 13d6 poison damage (1 minute); **Stage 2** 17d6 poison damage and [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (1 minute); **Stage 3** 20d6 poison damage and sickened 3 (1 minute)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Deathcap Powder
